sn45.7:1.2: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami …pe… ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn45.7:2.2: Kissa nu kho etaṃ, bhante, adhivacanaṃ:
sn45.7:3.1: Evaṃ vutte, so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn45.7:3.3: Katamaṃ nu kho, bhante, amataṃ, katamo amatagāmimaggo”ti?
sn45.7:3.6: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo amatagāmimaggo, seyyathidaṃ—
